channel.title: ðŸ‘‹ Hello! Jon here
channel.description:
Heyo,
I'm currently a full-time software engineer starting down the path of building something I think (hope!) other developers will think is useful. Not ready to share too many details about what I'm building, but it'll likely be a familiar space for many of you.
All this to say, I'll be digging through lots of good information contained in this forum, and may be soliciting free advice soon.
:smiley:
